name: Flatulent Cupid Ver 1.0
description:
You need to mouse click on the game in order for it to be able to detect keypresses.

Now plays in the browser on mobile AND desktop!

In the lower right, press the     expand icon to make it full screen 

Hit ESC escape key to exit full screen.

For more information on what I'm doing - check out:

https://flatulentcupid.com

https://flatulentcupid.substack.com/

https://flatulentcupid.threadless.com/

me on twitter https://twitter.com/eric81766

the project on twitter https://twitter.com/FlatulentCupid
